activities.loc: Branch 2 Courtroom, 2nd Floor, Oneida County Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeffrey John Haefner

records.addlTxt:
3:18 PM Defendant Jeffrey John Haefner in court. Attorney Elizabeth F Svehlek appeared by video for Jeffrey John Haefner. Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 22CF182, 22TR1604 & 22TR1575 & 22TR1576. Svehlek states has not received offer - would like to set out. Schiek has not received blood results. Court confirms Defendant's address. Bond continued. adj. 03:20 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Jeffrey John Haefner
Current: 8062 Boardwalk Dr., Eagle River, WI 54521 United States  (Effective: 09-26-2022)
Prior: 15340 E 97Th Place, Commerce, CO 80022
No intoxicants. No taverns. May not leave the State of Wisconsin.

2:53 PM Defendant Jeffrey John Haefner appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Elizabeth F Svehlek in court for Jeffrey John Haefner.  Prosecuting attorney Mary M Sowinski Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Also calling 22tr1574-1576 and 22tr1604.
Defendant waives preliminary hearing at this time.   Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over.
Sowinski states Information will be filed that mirrors Complaint. Svehlek willing to proceed to Arraignment today; waives further reading and enters not guilty pleas. 
Svehlek statement to bail -Sowinski statement. Court statement.  Court modifies to $2000 cash - same conditions and adds may not leave state of WI.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

records.addlTxt:
1:44 PM Prosecuting attorney Mary M Sowinski in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jeffrey John Haefner appeared by video, in custody. Calling 22CF182 & 22TR1574 - 22TR1576. Court review of case. Defendant states has contacted PD's office - has not heard back - not able to afford private counsel. Defendant statement to bond/health conditions. Court will set out. Bond continued. adj. 01:50 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

1:33 PM Prosecuting attorney Mary M Sowinski Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jeffrey John Haefner appeared by video, in custody. Defendant to receive copy of complaint, right to counsel. Court set $5000 cash bond over weekend. Sowinski/Defendant statement to bail. Court confirms address with Defendant/questions on connection with State of Wisconsin. Court continues cash bond. Defendant statement to BAC. adj. 01:41 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 12, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
